snippet.title: Derelicts - Official 'Wishlist Now' Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description:
Derelicts is a survival horror sandbox game developed by Romain. Players must not only investigate the ancient mechanism that triggered the fall of Earth, but also combat monsters, craft, and explore the wasteland in the name of survival. Derelicts is launching at a later date for PC with the ability to Wishlist the game on Steam available now.

#Derelicts
